sentences: Laual on neli jalga ja vankril neli ratast.
context: The Estonian word 'neli' is the cardinal number 4. It's used to count objects (e.g., neljast jalast - four legs), indicate time (e.g., kell neli - at four o'clock), and in mathematical expressions. The word has different grammatical forms depending on case, such as 'nelja' in genitive/illative cases.
